LearningContent.name: LearningContent
LearningContent.description: Represents a Trailhead or enablement site (myTrailhead) module assigned to a user in Workforce Engagement or Learning Paths. This object also represents a Trailhead module or video in an Enablement program exercise.

ApiName.description: The module's human-readable API name, such as pure-aloe-sales-strategies.

AvailablePointCount.description: The maximum points that a user can earn on their profile by completing the module. This value is the sum of points that the content creator assigns to the module’s units.

ContainsAssessmentType.description: Specifies the type of assessment that the content’s units include.

ContentType.description: The type of content assigned to the user.

ContentUrl.description: The absolute URL to the content, such as https://purealoe.my.trailhead.com/en/content/sales-team-enablement/modules/pure-aloe-sales-strategies.

DurationCount.description: The total time, in minutes, for a learner to complete all units in the module. This value is the sum of the estimated times that the content creator assigns to the module’s units.

ExternalId.description: The GUID that Trailhead uses to reference the module.

ImageUrl.description: The absolute URL to the module’s badge art image file.

IsPublic.description: Indicates whether the content is public Trailhead content (true) or private enablement site (myTrailhead) content (false).
